caption:
When Bart Bailey’s son experienced a severe mental health crisis, it could’ve broken their family, but instead it became the turning point. Bart chose to face the pain head-on, diving deep into his own past, trauma, and fears. Through that journey, he not only found healing for himself and his son, he built a community where other Black men could do the same.⁠
⁠
What started as one father trying to save his son has grown into a movement rooted in healing, vulnerability, and radical love.⁠
⁠
✨ You’ll want to read this one. It’s raw, it’s real, and it might just move you to reflect, reconnect, and rise.⁠
⁠
👉🏾 Click the link in bio to read the full story.⁠
